hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin 'Abdullah that the Messenger of Allah said:"It is not righteousness to fast when traveling. Take to the concession which Allah, the mighty and sublime, has granted you, accept it

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْمُبَارَكِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the different reports form 'Ali bin Al-Mubarak
